resources.string: Please enter your name and address
Time till the sms and email contacts are notified (all at once)
Time till the emergency contacts are called in order of priority
Adjust the slider bars to change the time from 0 seconds upto 300 seconds
Please list the contact information in order. From high priority (first) to low priority (last)

What is this message? This is an auto-generated message from the android security app WatchME. The likelihood of this being false alarm is completely dependant on the user\'s sensitivity settings. For the app to fulfil it\'s purpose the users should be made aware of it if they are sending out false alarms all the time. Please don\'t stop responding to such alerts just because one user is spamming you all the time.

The developers of WatchME are in no way responsible for any false alarms what soever. The likelihood of this being false alarm is completely dependant on the user\'s sensitivity settings. For the app to fulfil it\'s purpose the users should be made aware of it if they are sending out false alarms all the time.
